alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 15 at 1:24AM MST until February 15 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 85 mph expected in the mountains and up to 65 mph expected in the plains. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, Eddy County Plains, Eastern Culberson, Reeves County Plains, Davis, and Davis Mountains Foothills. * WHEN...Until midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County; Northern Lea County
